name: Flower of Ruined Castle, Empousa
effect: [AUTO]Front Row (RC):When you [Soul-Blast 4] or more at the same time for the cost of your vanguard's ability, if your unit did not [Stand] by a card's ability this turn, you may [Stand] this unit. If you [Stand] this unit, at the end of that turn, [COST][retire this unit], choose a grade 2 or greater unit card from your soul, and put it into your hand.

name: Dragontree of Ecliptic Decimation, Griphogila
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each Dragontree marker on your (RC). If you have three or more Dragontree markers, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose a face up Calamity card from your ride deck, and remove it. If you did not remove a card, choose a [Over] trigger from your ride deck, reveal it, activate all of its trigger effects and additional effects, remove it, and [Stand] all of your rear-guards on (RC) with a Dragontree marker.

name: Dragheart, Luard
effect: [AUTO](VC)Ritual 3:At the beginning of your ride phase, [COST][choose two normal units from your drop, and put them on the bottom of the deck in any order], until end of turn, you may [Stride] without paying the cost the next time you [Stride].[AUTO](VC):When your G unit Stride during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & choose one of your rear-guards, and retire it], search your deck for up to two grade 1 or less cards, call them to (RC), and shuffle the deck.
